channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mum's partner cried ‘save me’ after lithium 'hot tub' battery exploded in face
item.description: The fire is being treated as accidental and is believed to have been caused by the catastrophic failure of a lithium battery, which Ken was using to h...

item.title: Two women ‘kicked off a plane for wearing revealing’ crop tops
item.description: A flight attendant asked them to follow the airlines dress code.

item.title: People have some questions about ‘188-year-old man found living in a cave’
item.description: A video of the frail-looking man has gone viral.

item.title: Struggling households faced 'Herculean task' when remortgaging as defaults rise
item.description: 'Mortgage default rates are mounting, and we’ve not yet reached the peak. Banks expect them to be up again by the end of the year' - Sarah Coles, head...

item.title: Woman Calls 911 After Being Hounded By Up To 100 Raccoons
item.description: A woman in Kitsap County, Washington, had to flee her property after the creatures descended on it and were acting aggressively.

item.title: Zara fans praise 'divine' £60 dress you can wear to 'every Christmas event'
item.description: Shoppers love Zara's party-ready occasionwear and one dress, in particular, is getting lots of love after the glittery number went viral

item.title: Will there be more Northern Lights tonight? Aurora borealis phenomena for UK explained
item.description: Lucky Brits were able to capture stunning images of the Northern Lights, also known as aurora borealis, across the UK last night which filled the sky ...

item.title: Woman finds entire potato in ‘damp’ bag of Greggs crisps
item.description: Despite it causing the office to be in hysterics, the smell and dampness of the bag was rather concerning.

item.title: Swiss Court Rules Workers Must Clock Out For Bathroom Breaks
item.description: The court said that “Swiss law does not mention the right of employees to go to the toilet, even though this is a basic physiological need.”

item.title: Taxidermist turns rats into ‘sexy showgirls’ with nipple covers and fake eyelashes
item.description: 'When people come up to me they gasp or they clutch their pearls when they see what I have made and they get really excited, I love it so much.'

item.title: German oil tanker on fire with multiple injuries as 'explosion' sparks huge rescue operation
item.description: The 240ft tanker 'Annika' dramatically burst into flames following reports of a loud explosion while anchored in the Bay of Mecklenburg off the Baltic...
